oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter to Union veteran Jonathan Frazier concerning his pension
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This letter from Washington attorneys Tucker & Evans to Sgt. Frazier, Co. B, 13th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA instructing him about contracts and payments to them to facilitate his application for a pension based on his Civil War service. There was a thriving Washington legal industry based on fees from veterans for assistance with their Civil War pension applications.
